headline.main: TWO ALLIED FLAGS HOISTED AT BETIO; Stars and Stripes and Union Jack Fly Side by Side on Stripped Palm Trees

lead_paragraph: BETIO, Tarawa, Gilbert Islands, Nov. 24 (Delayed) -- Today two flags fly over this atoll, which, before the Japanese occupation shortly after Pearl Harbor, was the administrative center of the British Gilbert and Ellice Islands Crown Colony.
snippet: BETIO, Tarawa, Gilbert Islands, Nov. 24 (Delayed) -- Today two flags fly over this atoll, which, before the Japanese occupation shortly after Pearl Harbor, was the administrative center of the British Gilbert and Ellice Islands Crown Colony....

byline.original: By ROBERT TRUMBULLBy Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
